About
Conveniently located between four major metro cities - Detroit, Chicago, Toledo and Indianapolis - Yogi Bear's Jellystone Parkâ„¢ Barton Lake provides the perfect outdoor family vacation destination! With 540 campsites and over 40 cabins, we can accommodate all of your camping (or glamping) needs!

Spend the day enjoying an unparalleled line-up of attractions including an indoor pool, 3 outdoor pools, a huge Water Zone with splash pad, 5 playgrounds, mini golf course, swimming beach, a large recreation building, wagon rides, basketball courts, sand volleyball courts, and more! There's so much to do when you visit our campground in Indiana.

We invite you to find your next family tradition at Jellystone Parkâ„¢ Barton Lake, one of the best campgrounds in Indiana for families.

Upcoming Events
LABOR DAY: SUMMER SEND OFF WEEKEND
August 29 - September 1
Join us for an unforgettable Labor Day Weekend Celebration! Help us say goodbye to summer with a Block Party Potluck and entertainment that the kids are sure to love. Show off your patriotic pride for a chance to win a prize at our Golf Cart Decorating Contest & Parade! Plus, make sure to bring your A game for the Summer Sendoff Sport Competition.
YOGI BEARâ„¢ BIRTHDAY BASH WEEKEND
September 5 - September 7
Help us celebrate our bears with the ultimate Yogi Bearâ„¢ Birthday Bash! Stop by the Bear Birthday Party to enjoy a sweet treat and see the bears on their special day. Then, grab your fellow campers and begin the Park Pic-A-Nic Hunt, where a special surprise awaits at the end! Don't forget to stop by the Bear Boogie Dance Party for a roaring good time with your favorite furry friend!
FAIRYTALE FOREST WEEKEND
September 12 - September 14
Step into a magical realm full of fairytales and fun! Dress as your favorite fairytale character for a chance to win our Once Upon a Costume Contest, or dive into Fairytale Fun and Games! Kids can also enjoy special themed entertainment.
FALL FEST WEEKEND
September 19 - September 21
Fall festivities await at the Fall Fest! Bring your own pumpkin (or buy one from us!) and enter in the Pumpkin Decorating Contest. Participate in some friendly competition at the Fall Games, meet our special animal guests, and much more!
HALLOWEEN WEEKENDS
September 22 - November 2
Itâ€™s time to get spooky, campers! Jellystone Parkâ„¢ has lots of fun and frightful activities in store. Gather up lots of yummy treats with trick-or-treating, or watch the Halloween magic come to life during the Magic Pumpkin Experience ($). Show your creepy creative side with our Golf Cart Decorating Contest, Site Decorating, and Costume Contest! With lots of spooktacular events throughout the season, youâ€™ll be sure to have a bear-y scary time.

*Weekend Events Only
GOOD NIGHT, YOGI BEARâ„¢! WEEKEND
November 7 - November 9
As the air gets chilly, it's time for our furry friends to snuggle in for hibernation! Join us in celebrating the bears for one final time this season! Dance the night away at the PJ Dance Party and snuggle in at the Sweet Dreams Story Time. Then say, "Good Night, Bears!" as we put them to bed for the winter. We can't wait to see you again in the spring!

About
Camp Sandusky has offered great camping experiences for visitors to Sandusky, Ohio and Cedar Point for over 20 years. Just 6 miles to Cedar Point, the home of several world renowned roller coasters. Pick from a variety of sites including; Spacious RV sites, tent sites, and air-conditioned cabins. When you're not having a blast on the roller coasters at Cedar Point, you can join in on the fun events at Camp Sandusky. Book your spot today for fun and memories to last a lifetime!

A Solvable Problem
Our story started by wanting to solve a problem.
Founded in 2015, Campspot was created to bring a modern booking experience to the camping industry. At that time, nearly half the campgrounds in the US were not taking reservations online and we believed we could help more people experience the great outdoors if we brought a modern solution to this problem. It was this same problem-solving spirit that drove us to launch the Campspot Marketplace in the winter of 2020, which has helped thousands of campers research and instantly book from over 130,000 campsites
and counting.
Oh, and we believe weâ€™re just getting started.
Creating The Company We Love
We know that great teams are connected by great culture â€” which is why we take great care in caring for each other. Our core values came to be by assessing the actions and people we value today and whom weâ€™ve valued along the way â€” as well as who we aim to be as we continue to grow and evolve.
Core Value #1
First and foremost, weâ€™re all human. We respect and honor individuality, and prioritize each other and our customers. Camping is fun, after all!
Core Value #2
Whether itâ€™s the destination, or the journey, we strive boldly in the direction of progress. We honor the path that has been paved and celebrate the growth that occurs blazing new trails.
Core Value #3
The glow of a campfire starts with one small spark. We value passion and energy to get the job done, and the ability to inspire and motivate others along the way.
Core Value #4
We hire great people and trust them to do great things. Set up camp, explore your surroundings, and ask for directions if you get lost.
Driven by purpose. Inspired by each other.
Weâ€™re growing and always looking for passionate collaborators to help us achieve our mission. Weâ€™re looking to grow with people who embody our culture of learning, collaboration, and innovation. Check out our latest job opportunities.

and we'll reach out if anything becomes available.

About the Park
2023 CAMPSPOT AWARDS WINNER: Best Campgrounds for Families! 

Nestled along the rolling countryside, this 500 acre Camp-Resort is a top destination for outdoor fun in Northeast Ohio. When campers aren't busy swimming and splashing at the Adventure Park, bouncing high on the jumping pillows, or sinking a hole in one at the 18-hole mini golf, they can relax at their premium campsites and cabins around a crackling fire. Just a short drive from Cuyahoga Valley National Park and historic Canal-Fulton, Clay's Resort Jellystone Parkâ„¢ offers a breathtaking camping experience for everyone. Book your spot today!
